description: Light/dark/auto theme toggle with persistence implemented across all templates
notes:
IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE - FIXED TEMPLATE ERRORS

Files Modified:
- assets/beady/templates/index.html - Added theme control UI to header
- assets/beady/templates/blocked.html - Added theme control UI to header
- assets/beady/templates/ready.html - Added theme control UI to header
- assets/beady/templates/detail.html - Added theme control UI to header + Fixed template errors
- assets/beady/templates/graph.html - Added theme control UI to header + data-theme attribute
- assets/beady/static/app.js - Implemented theme persistence and application logic
- assets/beady/static/style.css - Extended with theme variables and lane color mappings
- README.md - Updated with theme customization documentation

Key Features Delivered:
- Universal Coverage: Theme settings work consistently across ALL templates
- Three Theme Options: Light, Dark, and Auto (respects system preference)
- Persistent Preferences: Theme choice saved to localStorage as 'beady.theme'
- Immediate Application: Theme changes apply instantly without page reload
- System Integration: Auto mode follows system prefers-color-scheme
- Accessible UI: Theme control includes proper ARIA labels and keyboard navigation
- Responsive Design: Theme control adapts to mobile layouts

Technical Implementation:
- Auto mode removes data-theme attribute to let Pico CSS @media(prefers-color-scheme) rules apply
- Explicit themes set data-theme="light" or data-theme="dark" to override system
- Lane colors properly mapped: --lane-open, --lane-in-progress, --lane-closed
- Status classes work correctly: status-open, status-in-progress, status-closed
- All templates use the same shared CSS and JavaScript for consistency
- FIXED: Template errors in detail.html that were preventing proper rendering

Testing Verified:
✅ Theme toggle updates colors immediately across ALL pages
✅ Preference persists across page reloads and navigation
✅ Auto mode follows system dark/light preference changes
✅ Mobile responsive layout works on all templates
✅ Screen reader accessibility confirmed on all pages
✅ Individual issue detail pages now respect theme settings

ISSUE RESOLVED: Dark mode is now working on individual issue detail pages after fixing template rendering errors.
